p: Eggs from ORL and HCM strains of Ae. aegypti were obtained from the Connecticut Agricultural Experimental Station and the HCM colony maintained at the Powell laboratory at Yale, respectively. Other laboratory strains arrived as eggs from different laboratories: Liverpool (D. Severson, University of Notre Dame), Rockefeller (G. Dimopoulos, Johns Hopkins School of Public Health). Field strains came as eggs collected from traps in the wild from Amacuzac, (Mexico) and Patillas (Puerto Rico)
